XML Validation Guide

Syntax Validation

Checks XML syntax and structure:

  • Well-formed XML
  • Proper tag nesting
  • Valid character encoding

XSD Validation

Validates against XML Schema:

  • Data types
  • Element structure
  • Attribute constraints

DTD Validation

Validates against Document Type Definition:

  • Element declarations
  • Attribute lists
  • Entity references

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I validate XML against XSD?

Upload both your XML file and XSD schema, select "XSD Schema" validation option, and click the Validate button. The tool will check if your XML conforms to the schema.

Can I convert XML to other formats?

Yes, our tool supports conversion between XML and various formats including JSON and YAML. Simply paste your XML, select the desired output format, and click Convert.

What XML versions are supported?

Our tools support XML 1.0 and 1.1, including support for namespaces, CDATA sections, and processing instructions.
